attributes.action: use all cash from speed cameras to put more police on the beat and not c,s,p,os
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
use all cash raised by the use of speed cameras to put police officers back on the beat in our communities and get rid of the community police suport officers as they do nothing.
And are a waste of money.
where  police officers are a visable law enforcement agencey and cpsos are a not
